feed.title: Bitcoin Guarantees Strong, not Eventual, Consistency.

entry.title: Bitcoin Guarantees Strong, not Eventual, Consistency.
entry.summary: Bitcoin is often perceived as being eventually consistent, but according to a post on Hacking Distributed, this perception is completely false. Instead, Bitcoin guarantees strong consistency. The author of the post suggests that the idea of eventual consistency has become a bad meme and should be laid to rest.
